channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How Trump's travel ban could disrupt the way knowledge about health is shared
item.description: Global health specialists talk about the consequences of the full or partial ban on travel to the U.S. from 19 countries.

item.title: Kraft Heinz to remove artificial dyes from all products, like Jell-O and Kool-Aid
item.description: By 2027, Kraft Heinz says all artificial food dyes will be replaced with natural colors. The move comes two months after federal officials called on f...

item.title: Leader of top FEMA disaster coordination office resigns, as Trump moves to eliminate agency

item.title: In just 3 months, Ramp’s valuation jumped to $16B, up from $13B
item.description: Spend management startup Ramp announced on Tuesday that it raised a $200 million Series E led by its largest investor, Founders Fund.

item.title: How a weekend of chaos unfolded in the Minnesota shootings
Intel to lay off up to 20% of Intel Foundry workers
item.description: Rumors of these layoffs began back in April as Intel looks to refocus on its core business units and shed additional bloat.

item.title: Minnesota shooting suspect had dozens of potential targets, prosecutors say
Facebook announces that all videos on its platform will soon be shared as reels
item.description: Facebook announced on Tuesday that all videos on its platform will soon be shared as reels, regardless of their length or orientation.

item.title: Applied Intuition raises $600 million as it pushes further into defense
item.description: The buzzy AI-powered autonomous vehicle software company doubles its valuation from last year -- and then some.

item.title: Pro-Israel hacktivist group claims reponsibility for alleged Iranian bank hack
